Package uk.co.dancowan.robots.hal.core

Interface Summary
Command Interface for an SRV1 command.
CommandListener Interface for objects wishing to monitor a Command.
Component Interface to mark a physical components of the SRV1 system.
ConnectionListener Interface for SRV1 connection events.
 

Class Summary
AbstractComponent Abstract base class for Components.
CommandEvent Event class thrown by Command instances to indicate events in the life cycle of the Command.
CommandQ Manages the command communication between the console and the hardware SRV.
Config Configuration class handles persistent non UI configuration properties.
Connection Handles establishing a connection to the SRV.
HALRegistry Top level container class for hardware components.
